channel.title: All Npcs Hit 0
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Lately i have been adding npcs in my autospawn.cfg. I am currently using a devolution 7.0 server source. I have recently added around 30 npcs and all of them hit 0 no matter where their location is or what stats i set them to.
All help is appreciated :)
Thanx

item.title: All Npcs Hit 0
item.dc:creator: @pimpylt pimpylt
item.description:
@pimpylt wrote:

u see where it says hitdiff 2 + wuts ur say is it 0 ???

Read full topic

item.title: All Npcs Hit 0
item.dc:creator: @pimpylt pimpylt
item.description:
@pimpylt wrote:

i think its like i said go to ur server folder open npchandler… search for the npc id … then it should say hitdiff misc 0 + random or somtin like dat on mine i see mostly like 2 + heres wut mine looks like’

}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1241 && GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 10) == true) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 711; // mage attack
p.stillgfx(363, p.absY, p.absX);
hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(19);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 914 && GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 10) == true) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 811; // mage attack
p.stillgfx(77, p.absY, p.absX);
if (server.playerHandler.players[Player].MagicProtect == false) {
hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(18);
}

Read full topic
